title: Preface
text:
Preface
This project is my attempt to redo some of GiveWellâ€™s calculations using the format of an Quarto book, and mostly using the programming language R instead of their method of Google spreadsheets and separate webpages.
This work is currently very incomplete, but I did notice two small (and ultimately insignificant) errors in two of their spreadsheets.

See ?@sec-targetted-nigeria
